text: intro hey there fellow farmers and agricultural enthusiasts Welcome to our video on maintaining your combine harvester have you ever wondered how to keep your combine running smoothly all season long well you're in the right place today we're going to walk you through a step-by-step guide on combine maintenance proper upkeep is crucial for Optimal Performance and longevity of your machine so let's dive in and learn how to keep your combine in top sh shape main content first up let's talk about the importance of combine maintenance regular upkeep can significantly extend the life of your machine it helps prevent unexpected breakdowns during crucial Harvest times proper maintenance also ensures better fuel efficiency and crop quality now let's move on to our pre- Harvest checklist before the harvest season begins inspect your combine thoroughly check the engine oil and coolant levels examine belts and chains for proper tension and wear inspect the cutting platform including knives and guards don't forget to look at the threshing mechanism and cleaning shoe clean out any debris from the previous season test all lights and safety equipment moving on to daily maintenance tasks during harvest season start each day by greasing all fittings as per the manufacturer's recommendations check fluid levels including engine oil hydraulic oil and coolant inspect belts and chains for proper tension clean the radiator and other cooling components empty the rock trap if your combine has one check tire pressure and adjust if necessary clean the grain tank and unloading augur at the end of each day take time for some additional care clean off any crop residue from the machine check for any loose or missing bolts inspect the header for damage or wear look for any oil leaks and address them promptly now let's discuss post Harvest care once the Harvest is complete give your combine a thorough cleaning remove all crop residue to prevent rust and rodent damage change all fluids and filters as recommended by the manufacturer lubricate all necessary points touch up any paint chips to prevent rust store the combine in a dry covered area if possible if storing outside use a quality tarp to protect it from the elements let's move on to troubleshooting common issues if you're experiencing uneven cutting check the sickle sections and guards for inconsistent threshing adjust the concave clearance and rotor speed if you notice grain loss inspect the sves and adjust the fan speed for engine problems check fuel filters and lines for contamination if you're having hydraulic issues look for leaks and check fluid levels remember always consult your operator's manual for Specific Instructions if you're unsure about any maintenance task don't hesitate to contact a professional outro and there you have it folks a comprehensive guide to maintaining your combine harvester by following these steps you'll keep your machine running smoothly all season long do you have any combine maintenance tips to share leave them in the comments below don't forget to like this video And subscribe to our channel for more farming tips thanks for watching and happy harvesting
